meanings.definition: A job or situation that is undemanding or easy.
meanings.sent1: Working as a movie extra can be a cushy gig.
meanings.sent2: He landed a cushy job at the local bakery.
meanings.sent3: The cushy office job allowed for plenty of coffee breaks.
meanings.sent4: She thought being a princess was a cushy life until she tried it.
meanings.sent5: The retired couple enjoyed their cushy lifestyle in the countryside.
